document.full_text: the death toll of at least 45 people from a nasty series of tornadoes and severe storms across the southern united states over the weekend was the highest in more than three years, experts said on monday.
document.title: deaths from weekend storms most in three years
lines_and_colors: the death toll of at least 45 people from a nasty series of tornadoes and severe storms across the southern united states over the weekend was the highest in more than three years, experts said on monday.
